item.description:
It's not pouring rain out there.....but it has rained some and the rocks on the White Dot trail up Uncanoonuc will be slippery. So Plunk and I are going to do a nice walk around Dorr's Pond instead. I'll set up a mid-week hike for Uncanoonuc on another day when the weather is a little better.

Hope you will join us today at Dorr's Pond. We'll be in the parking lot at Dorr's Pond (inside Livingston Park) at 4:30 pm.

Plunk 'n Plunk

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Uncanoonuc North Mountain - Changed to Dorr's Pond due to Weather
